meanings.definition: Covered in or characterized by blebs.
meanings.sent1: The blebby surface of the bubble wrap provided endless entertainment for the toddler.
meanings.sent2: The scientist observed the blebby appearance of the cell membrane under the microscope.
meanings.sent3: The blebby texture of the pudding made it look like a bumpy road.
meanings.sent4: Her blebby skin after a long bath reminded her of a wrinkled prune.
meanings.sent5: The blebby texture of the slime was both fascinating and gross to the children.

meanings.sent1: The blebby clouds in the sky looked like fluffy cotton candy.
meanings.sent2: The artist painted a blebby landscape with small rounded hills.
meanings.sent3: The blebby pattern on the fabric reminded her of tiny bubbles.
meanings.sent4: The blebby design on the cake made it look like a work of art.
meanings.sent5: The blebby texture of the sponge cake made it light and airy.
